  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3088</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Compare Cinderella Stories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie Aschenputtel Geschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez Les Histoires de Cendrillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare Histórias De Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti Le Storia Della Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε τις ιστορίες Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare Las Historias De Cinderella</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the students read about Cinderalla in different cultures and fill in a chart by answering questions which compare two different Cinderella stories</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fairy tales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität lesen die Kursteilnehmer 
über Cinderalla in den unterschiedlichen Kulturen und füllen ein 
Diagramm aus, indem sie Fragen beantworten, die zwei unterschiedliche 
Aschenputtel Geschichten vergleichen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité les étudiants ont connaissance 
de Cinderalla dans différentes cultures et complètent un diagramme 
par la réponse des questions qui comparent deux histoires 
différentes de Cendrillon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os estudantes lêem sobre 
Cinderalla em culturas diferentes e preenchem uma carta respondendo 
às perguntas que comparam duas histórias diferentes de Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività gli allievi leggono su 
Cinderalla nelle colture differenti e riempono una tabella rispondendo
alle domande che confrontano due storia differenti della Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι σπουδαστές διαβάζουν για
Cinderalla στους διαφορετικούς πολιτισμούς και συμπληρώνουν ένα
διάγραμμα με την απάντηση των ερωτήσεων που συγκρίνουν δύο 
διαφορετικές ιστορίες Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los estudiantes leen sobre 
Cinderalla en diversas culturas y completan una carta contestando a 
las preguntas que comparan dos diversas historias de Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
